body:
This means you use JSON to define:

* your overall form (its name and phase - Alpha, Beta or Live)
* each page within the form
* each component and item within each page (such as a radio button or text box)

You store your JSON files in a repository on [GitHub](https://github.com/).
heading: How Form Builder uses JSON (javascript object notation)
lede: Form Builder works by representing all of the elements in a form as data written in JSON (javascript object notation).
